# The `DbgRecordParamRef` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A typed tracking <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> reference that does not require a definition for its parameter type. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A typed tracking <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> reference that does not require a definition for its parameter type.

Necessary to avoid including <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debuginfometadata-h">DebugInfoMetadata.h</a>, which has a significant impact on compile times if included in this file.

Definition at line 76 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h">DebugProgramInstruction.h</a>.

### DbgRecordParamRef() {#af59341934b52fb42a951ca74a8ff2249}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>llvm::DbgRecordParamRef&lt; T &gt;::DbgRecordParamRef (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; Param)</>}
  labels = {["explicit"]}>
Construct from an <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a></em>.

Note: if <code>Param</code> does not have the template type, a verifier check will fail, and accessors will crash. However, construction from other nodes is supported in order to handle forward references when reading textual IR.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h/#l00092">92</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h">DebugProgramInstruction.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debugprograminstruction-cpp/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debugprograminstruction-cpp">DebugProgramInstruction.cpp</a>.
